name: Fateel - فتيل
description:
After a crime detective wakes up from a coma, he finds himself stuck in a dark basement with a bunch of bombs, and now he must use them to solve puzzles and find a way out.

Find a way out! 🕯️

Challenge your puzzle-solving abilities in a mysterious world full of challenges.

Push boxes, carry bombs and take advantage of the environment around you, to find out what happened to you.

Solve the Puzzles 🔎

Solve puzzles and challenges distributed over 25 different rooms, which will get more difficult as you progress in the game.

Make use of the dialogues to build a logical solution to the puzzles.

Main features of the PC version 💣

  • Better graphics quality
  • Better sound effects
  • Better performance
  • Advanced player settings
  • Full Xbox controller support
  • Additional side missions
